dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Consul General Jiang Wei just announced the second China-Central Asia summit is happening in June in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Consul General Jiang Wei just announced the second China-Central Asia summit is happening in June in Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In her speech, Chinese Consul General in Almaty Jiang Wei noted that the second "China"Central Asia" summit will take place in June. Leaders of six nations will gather in Kazakhstan to explore cooperation prospects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, that's a big deal. And it's bringing together leaders from all six nations, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, that's a big deal. And it's bringing together leaders from all six nations, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Leaders of six nations will gather in Kazakhstan to explore cooperation prospects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. She mentioned they want to enhance strategic mutual trust and continue what she called a centuries-old friendship.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. She mentioned they want to enhance strategic mutual trust and continue what she called a centuries-old friendship.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The Chinese side is ready to work with all parties to further enhance strategic mutual trust, continue the centuries-old friendship, and jointly build even closer cooperation," said the Consul General.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that's really interesting—Bulat Sultanov from the Belt and Road Expert Club also emphasized how cooperation has been mutually beneficial across so many fields.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that's really interesting-Bulat Sultanov from the Belt and Road Expert Club also emphasized how cooperation has been mutually beneficial across so many fields.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bulat Sultanov, head of the Belt and Road Expert Club, emphasized that over the years, Central Asian countries and China have proven capable of mutually beneficial cooperation in various fields " from economy and trade to education, culture, and tourism.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, from economy and trade to education and tourism. It's not just talk; there's real substance there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, from economy and trade to education and tourism. It's not just talk; there's real substance there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bulat Sultanov, head of the Belt and Road Expert Club, emphasized that over the years, Central Asian countries and China have proven capable of mutually beneficial cooperation in various fields " from economy and trade to education, culture, and tourism.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And he stressed that it's all based on mutual respect and equality, which is uh, crucial for long-term partnerships.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he stressed that it's all based on mutual respect and equality, which is uh, crucial for long-term partnerships.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "It is essential to develop efforts to clarify the mutually beneficial cooperation between the region's countries and China " cooperation based on mutual respect, trust, good neighborliness, friendship, and equality," the expert stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right. And then Ruslan Kenzhaev from Narodnoe Slovo pointed out how these ties open new horizons for Central Asian countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. And then Ruslan Kenzhaev from Narodnoe Slovo pointed out how these ties open new horizons for Central Asian countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ruslan Kenzhaev, deputy editor-in-chief of Uzbekistan's Narodnoe Slovo newspaper, said that strengthening partnerships with China opens new horizons for Central Asian nations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's not just economic either—Ismail Dairov highlighted that these close ties have been maintained for centuries, so there's historical depth here.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's not just economic either-Ismail Dairov highlighted that these close ties have been maintained for centuries, so there's historical depth here.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ismail Dairov, Director of the Central Asia Regional Mining Center, noted that the countries of Central Asia have maintained close ties and cooperation for centuries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And Anushervon Rasulov added that both sides face similar challenges, like technological transformation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And Anushervon Rasulov added that both sides face similar challenges, like technological transformation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Anushervon Rasulov, Editor-in-Chief of Asal Media, added that both China and Central Asia face similar challenges " from the need for technological transformation to balancing tradition and innovation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: He even suggested that Chinese modernization could serve as a catalyst for Central Asia, which is a pretty powerful idea.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He even suggested that Chinese modernization could serve as a catalyst for Central Asia, which is a pretty powerful idea.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "In this context, Chinese modernization serves not only as an example but also as a potential catalyst for similar processes in Central Asia," he concluded.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like this forum in Almaty was really focused on actionable collaboration, not just dialogue.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like this forum in Almaty was really focused on actionable collaboration, not just dialogue.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. You get the sense that everyone's aligned on making this partnership deeper and more practical.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. You get the sense that everyone's aligned on making this partnership deeper and more practical.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And with the summit coming up, it feels like things are moving quickly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And with the summit coming up, it feels like things are moving quickly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. I'm what do you think will be the biggest outcome from the June meeting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. I'm what do you think will be the biggest outcome from the June meeting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hard to say, but if they build on this momentum, we could see some major joint initiatives announced.
